VoidUI_assault_1: How many Nintendo consoles do you own?
VoidUI_assault_5: How long is this ticker anyway?
VoidUI_assault_6: That's the alarm guys, it's on now
VoidUI_assault_8: Very fast VR heister dabs at incredible high speeds
VoidUI_assault_10: Fuck me, we needed those damn cooks
VoidUI_assault_11: I hope you liked using silencer skills
VoidUI_assault_14: Do try this in real life
VoidUI_assault_17: Local streamer becomes funny easter egg line
VoidUI_assault_21: You have been kicked from the game
VoidUI_assault_22: The secret assault message is cosmetic
VoidUI_assault_25: No mercy will be cancelled in 2015
VoidUI_options_desc: Customize the look and feel of Void UI
VoidUI_hud_scale_desc:
The scale of every hud element. 
Elements can also be resized separately
VoidUI_outlines_desc: Make the outline of converted cops match their owner's color
VoidUI_assault_lines_desc:
Add narrator responses warning of the next imminent assault.

[Disabled: Dont remind]
[Light: 30 second warning]
[Standard: 30, 20, and 10 second warning]
VoidUI_reset_desc: Reset every option to their default value
VoidUI_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset Void UI to the default configuration? This can not be undone.
VoidUI_warning_desc: Some of your changes may not take effect until the next heist
VoidUI_hudteammate_desc: Options related to you and your teammates' hud panels
VoidUI_teammate_panels_decs: Enable the custom Player and Teammate Panels of Void UI
VoidUI_main_scale_desc: The scale of your hud panel
VoidUI_main_health_desc:
The mode your current health value is shown.

[Disabled: Dont show]
[Percentage: The percentage of your current/total health]
[Real Value: The actual amount of health you currently have]
VoidUI_main_anim_time_desc: The time of the health change animation when healing/taking damage (in seconds)
VoidUI_armor_desc:
The mode your current armor value is shown.

[Disabled: Dont show]
[Percentage: The percentage of your current/total armor]
[Real Value: The actual amount of armor you currently have]
VoidUI_total_decs: Show the amount of ammo you have in reserve instead of your total ammo
VoidUI_main_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs you have left before you go to custody (loud only)
VoidUI_main_stealth_desc: Show the amount of body bags you have left (stealth only)
VoidUI_ammo_pickup_desc: Show the amount of ammo you've picked up
VoidUI_main_fg_desc: The color of the outlines, the text and the equipment icons on the main player panel
VoidUI_mate_scale_desc: The scale of your teammates' hud panels
VoidUI_mate_health_desc:
The mode your teammates' health value is shown.

[Disabled: Dont show]
[Percentage: The percentage of their current/total health]
[Real Value: The actual amount of health they currently have]
VoidUI_mate_anim_time_desc: The time of the health change animation of your teammates' when healing/taking damage (in seconds)
VoidUI_mate_armor_desc:
The mode your teammates' current armor value is shown.

[Disabled: Dont show]
[Percentage: The percentage of their current/total armor]
[Real Value: The actual amount of armor they currently have]
VoidUI_mate_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs your teammates' have left before they go to custody (loud only)
VoidUI_mate_stealth_desc: Show your teammates' detection risk in their health bars (stealth only)
VoidUI_mate_name_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level before their name
VoidUI_mate_interact_desc: Show the remaining time for your teammates' interactions
VoidUI_mate_show_desc:
The way your teammates' panels are shown 

[Hide: Never show your teammates hud panels]
[Only Players: Hide AI teammates hud panels]
[Show: Show hud panels for both AI and player teammates]
VoidUI_objectives_desc: Options related to the heist timer and objectives panels
VoidUI_objectives_scale_desc: The scale of both the heist timer and the objectives
VoidUI_objectives_show_timer_desc:
Show or hide the timer panel 

[Hide: Never show]
[On Tabscreen: Only show while the tabscreen is open]
[Show: Always show]
VoidUI_enable_timer_desc: Enable the custom heist timer of Void UI
VoidUI_levelname_desc: Show the name of the current day of the heist
VoidUI_ghost_desc: Show a ghost icon on stealthable levels. Turns red if stealth is failed
VoidUI_loot_desc: Show the amount of loot you have secured during the heist
VoidUI_enable_objectives_desc: Enable the custom objectives panel of Void UI
VoidUI_objective_history_desc: The amount of past objectives that can be displayed
VoidUI_objectives_show_desc:
Show or hide the objectives panel 

[Hide: Never show]
[On Tabscreen: Only show while the tabscreen is open]
[Show: Always show]
VoidUI_assault_desc: Options related to the assault panel
VoidUI_enable_assault_decs: Enable the custom assault panel of Void UI
VoidUI_badge_desc: Show a police badge icon during assaults
VoidUI_badge_anim_desc: Animate the police badge with a fancy 'pulse' effect
VoidUI_hostages_desc: Show civilian and police hostages in seprate panels (loud only)
VoidUI_pagers_desc:
Show the amount of pagers you have left (stealth only)
For this feature to work correctly you have to have played the heist from the start
VoidUI_jammer_desc:
Show the battery life of placed ecm jammers (stealth only)

[Hide: Don't show]
[First Placed: When multiple jammers are active, show the oldest one]
[Last Placed: When multiple jammers are active, show the latest one]
VoidUI_chat_desc: Options related to the player chat
VoidUI_enable_chat_decs: Enable the custom text chat of Void UI
VoidUI_chat_scale_desc: The scale of the player chat
VoidUI_chat_mouse_desc: Unlock the mouse when using chat. With mouse unlocked you can scroll easier and copy messages
VoidUI_charactername_desc: Show what heister the message's sender is playing as in brackets
VoidUI_chattime_desc:
Show the time messages were sent at. 

[Hide: Don't show]
[Game Time: The time since the start of the current heist day]
[System Time: The real time your PC displays]
VoidUI_chat_copy_desc: What part of a chat message gets copied to clipboard when you right click them
VoidUI_enable_voice_decs: Enable the custom voice chatting players indicators of Void UI
VoidUI_voice_scale_desc: The scale of the chatter indicators
VoidUI_label_desc: Options related to the floating labels and waypoints
VoidUI_enable_labels_desc: Enable the custom name labels of Void UI
VoidUI_jokernames_desc: Add name labels for converted cops
VoidUI_jokerhealth_desc: Show the health of converted cops on their name label
VoidUI_minlabel_desc: Name labels will become smaller when their owner is far away from you or you're not looking directly at them
VoidUI_label_minscale_desc: The scale of the name labels in minimal mode
VoidUI_minrank_title: Show rank and level in minmode
VoidUI_minrank_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level when their labels are in minimal mode
VoidUI_mindist_desc: The distance away from you after the name labels should enter minimal mode (in meters)
VoidUI_mindot_desc: How directly you need to look at another player to temporarily disable minmode on their label
VoidUI_enable_waypoints_desc: Enable the custom waypoints of Void UI
VoidUI_waypoint_scale_desc: The scale of the objective waypoints and awareness markers
VoidUI_waypoint_radius_desc: How far offscreen waypoints are from the center of your screen when their source is out of view
VoidUI_waypoint_offscreen_desc: Show waypoints when their source is out of view
VoidUI_interact_desc: Options related to the interaction panel and the stealth detection panel
VoidUI_enable_interact_desc: Enable the custom interaction panel of Void UI
VoidUI_interact_scale_desc: The scale of the interaction panel
VoidUI_interact_y_desc: The vertical position of the interaction panel from the middle of the screen
VoidUI_interacttime_desc: Show the remaining time from your interaction
VoidUI_enable_suspicion_desc: Enable the custom stealth detection panel of Void UI
VoidUI_suspicion_y_desc: The vertical position of the detection panel from the middle of the screen
VoidUI_suspicion_scale_desc: The scale of the detection panel
VoidUI_stats_desc: Options related to the TAB stats screen
VoidUI_enable_stats_desc: Enable the custom stats screen of Void UI
VoidUI_scoreboard_scale_desc: The scale of the stats panel
VoidUI_blur_desc: Blur the background when the stats panel is open
VoidUI_scoreboard_maxlevel_desc: Show the experience bar when you are at level 100
VoidUI_scoreboard_desc: Add a scoreboard to the stats screen where you can see statistics about you and your teammates
VoidUI_scoreboard_accuracy_desc: Show your hit accuracy during the current day
VoidUI_scoreboard_delay_desc: Show how long you'd have to wait to be traded if you were in custody
VoidUI_scoreboard_character_desc: Show the mask of the heister a player is playing as
VoidUI_scoreboard_skills_desc: Show the number of skillpoints a player has spent in each skilltree
VoidUI_scoreboard_kills_desc:
Show the amount of law enforcers a player has killed

[Disabled: Don't show]
[Exclude specials: Don't count killed specials as normal kills]
[Include specials: Count killed specials as normal kills]
VoidUI_scoreboard_specials_desc: Show the amount of special units a player has killed
VoidUI_scoreboard_civs_desc: Show the amount of civilians a player has killed
VoidUI_scoreboard_downs_desc: Show the amount of times a player has been downed
VoidUI_scoreboard_weapons_desc: Show a player's equiped primary, secondary (mask for bots), and melee weapons
VoidUI_scoreboard_skins_desc:
Show skins applied to players' weapons

[Disabled: Don't show weapon skins]
[With rarity: Show the skins rarity icon behind the weapon]
[Without rarity: Don't show the skins rarity icon]
VoidUI_scoreboard_perk_desc: Show the equiped perk deck and its level of the player (crew ability for bots)
VoidUI_scoreboard_playtime_desc: Show the amount of hours the player has in payday if their profile and game hours are public (crew boost for bots)
VoidUI_scoreboard_ping_desc: Show other players latency to you
VoidUI_ping_frequency_desc: How often ping values update (in seconds)
VoidUI_scoreboard_toggle_desc: The button that toggles between the scoreboard and tracked achievements
VoidUI_enable_presenter_desc: Enable the custom presenter notifications of Void UI
VoidUI_presenter_scale_desc: The scale of presenter notification panels
VoidUI_presenter_buffer_desc: The maximum amount of notifications visible at the same time
VoidUI_presenter_sound_desc: Disable playing sound effects when hints and notifications appear
VoidUI_enable_hint_desc: Enable the custom hints panel of Void UI
VoidUI_hint_scale_desc: The scale of the hint text
VoidUI_hint_anim_desc: Animate hints with a fancy 'jump out' effect
VoidUI_vape_hints_desc: Display a hint notification when tagging somebody/being tagged by the Tag Team perk-deck. Also adds a few seconds long outline
VoidUI_enable_challanges_desc: Enable the custom challenge notifications of Void UI
VoidUI_hint_challanges_desc: The scale of challenge notification panels
VoidUI_enable_subtitles_desc: Enable the custom subtitles of Void UI
VoidUI_subtitles_bg_desc:
The background style of subtitles

[Disabled: No background]
[Dropshadow: Gives a shadow text to subtitles]
[Solid Color: Subtitles have a colored box as background]
VoidUI_blackscreen_desc: Options related to the heist intro (blackscreen) and loading screens
VoidUI_enable_blackscreen_desc: Enable the custom heist intro (blackscreen) of Void UI
VoidUI_blackscreen_map_desc: Show the name of the current day of the heist
VoidUI_blackscreen_risk_desc: Show the name of the difficulty you're playing on
VoidUI_blackscreen_skull_desc: Show skull icons based on the difficulty you're playing on
VoidUI_blackscreen_linger_desc: Fade from the heist intro to your game
VoidUI_blackscreen_time_desc: How long you have to hold the Enter key for to skip the intro
VoidUI_enable_loadingscreen_desc: Enable the custom loading screens of Void UI
VoidUI_loading_heistinfo_desc: Show information about the heist like its name, the contractor and selected difficulty
VoidUI_loading_players_desc: Show the name of the players you are connected to
VoidUI_loading_briefing_desc: Show the contractor's briefing for the heist
VoidUI_joining_desc: Options related to the joining drop-in clients panel
VoidUI_enable_joining_desc: Enable the cutom joining drop-in clients panel of Void UI
VoidUI_joining_rank_desc: Show the joining player's level and infamy rank
VoidUI_joining_time_desc: Show the estimated time until the player joins
VoidUI_joining_border_desc: The whole panel will use the joining players peer color
VoidUI_joining_anim_desc:
The animation style of the panel

[Static: Don't animate]
[Rotating: The panel is slowly rotating left or right]
[Pulsing: The panel is slowly growing or shrinking]
[Rotating and Pulsing: The panel both rotates and pulses at the same time]
VoidUI_joining_mods_desc: Show the joining players installed mods
VoidUI_joining_mods_scale_desc: The scale of the installed mods panel
VoidUI_joining_drawing_desc: Lets you draw on the joining screen by holding down Ctrl + Left Mouse Button
